code: import{createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export const manageFilterTypes=createAsyncThunk('filterTypes/manageFilterTypes',async(vars,_ref)=>{let{rejectWithValue}=_ref;const params=new URLSearchParams({action:vars.action,id:vars.id,filter_type:vars.type,trackable:vars.trackable});try{const response=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_PY_SERVER,"/manageFilterTypes?").concat(params.toString()),{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json'}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}const data=await response.json();return data;}catch(error){return rejectWithValue(error.message);}});
